name: Canadian Pacific Railway Limited
title: BRIEF-Teamsters reach tentative agreement with Canadian Pacific

content: Sept 6 Activist investor William Ackman left the board of Canadian Pacific on Tuesday  marking the end of a four-year tenure that helped overhaul the ailing railroad company and earn his hedge fund roughly $2.6 billion.
name: Canadian Pacific Railway Limited
title: UPDATE 1-Ackman off Canadian Pacific board  ends four-year tenure

content: BOSTON/MONTREAL Billionaire investor William Ackman has exited his hedge fund's investment in railway company Canadian Pacific   freeing up roughly $1.5 billion in cash to make other future investments.
name: Canadian Pacific Railway Limited
title: Ackman exits Canadian Pacific  freeing up cash for next bet

content: BOSTON/MONTREAL  Aug 3 Billionaire investor William Ackman has exited his hedge fund's investment in railway company Canadian Pacific  freeing up roughly $1.5 billion in cash to make other future investments.
name: Canadian Pacific Railway Limited
title: UPDATE 1-Ackman exits Canadian Pacific  freeing up cash for next bet

title: BRIEF-Pershing Square Holdings Ltd announces sale of Canadian Pacific stock

content: * Says on track to achieve annual productivity savings of more than $650 million and an operating ratio below 65 percent by 2020
name: Canadian Pacific Railway Limited
title: BRIEF-Norfolk Southern says savings plan on track after Canadian Pacific drops bid for co

content: CHICAGO/MONTREAL Canadian Pacific Railway Ltd  Chief Executive Hunter Harrison on Monday said the company would consider using cash once planned to acquire rival Norfolk Southern Corp  for a potential buyback  dividend  or combination of both. | Video
name: Canadian Pacific Railway Limited
title: CP Rail mulls buyback  dividend after dropping Norfolk bid: CEO
